mapper.update: /* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApxTableMYSQLDao.createApOngdApvLnD : ${sqlSeq} */ CREATE TABLE AP_${storId}_APV_LN_D ( APV_NO BIGINT NOT NULL COMMENT '결재번호', APV_LN_HST_NO INT NOT NULL COMMENT '결재라인이력번호', APV_LN_PNO INT NOT NULL COMMENT '결재라인부모번호', APV_LN_NO INT NOT NULL COMMENT '결재라인번호', DBL_APV_TYP_CD VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '이중결재구분코드', APVR_ROLE_CD VARCHAR (30) NOT NULL COMMENT '결재자역할코드', APV_STAT_CD VARCHAR (30) NOT NULL COMMENT '결재상태코드', ABS_RSON_CD VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '부재사유코드', ABS_RSON_NM VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '부재사유명', APVR_DEPT_YN CHAR (1) NOT NULL COMMENT '결재자부서여부', PICH_APNT_YN CHAR (1) COMMENT '담당자지정여부', PRED_YN CHAR (1) COMMENT '전결여부', AGNT_UID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '대결자UID', APVR_UID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '결재자UID', APVR_NM VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '결재자명', APVR_POSIT_CD VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '결재자직위코드', APVR_POSIT_NM VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '결재자직위명', APVR_TITLE_CD VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '결재자직책코드', APVR_TITLE_NM VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '결재자직책명', APV_DEPT_ID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '결재부서ID', APV_DEPT_NM VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '결재부서명', APV_DEPT_ABBR_NM VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '결재부서약어명', POSIT_DISP_VA VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '직위표시값', SIGN_DISP_VA VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '서명표시값', DT_DISP_VA VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '일시표시값', SIGN_IMG_PATH VARCHAR (240) COMMENT '서명이미지경로', VW_DT DATETIME COMMENT '조회일시', APV_DT DATETIME COMMENT '결재일시', PREV_APVR_APV_DT DATETIME COMMENT '이전결재자결재일시', APV_OPIN_CONT VARCHAR (2000) COMMENT '결재의견내용', APV_OPIN_DISP_YN CHAR (1) COMMENT '결재의견표시여부', PREV_BODY_HST_NO INT COMMENT '이전본문이력번호', HOLD_BODY_HST_NO INT COMMENT '보류본문이력번호', PREV_APV_LN_HST_NO INT COMMENT '이전결재라인이력번호', HOLD_APV_LN_HST_NO INT COMMENT '보류결재라인이력번호', PREV_ATT_HST_NO INT COMMENT '이전첨부이력번호', HOLD_ATT_HST_NO INT COMMENT '보류첨부이력번호', PREV_RECV_DEPT_HST_NO INT COMMENT '이전수신처이력번호', HOLD_RECV_DEPT_HST_NO INT COMMENT '보류수신처이력번호', PREV_REF_DOC_HST_NO INT COMMENT '이전참조문서이력번호', HOLD_REF_DOC_HST_NO INT COMMENT '보류참조문서이력번호', FIXD_APVR_YN CHAR (1) COMMENT '고정결재자여부', PRIMARY KEY (APV_NO, APV_LN_PNO, APV_LN_NO) ) COMMENT = '진행문서결재라인상세'

/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApxTableMYSQLDao.createApOngdApvLnE : ${sqlSeq} */ CREATE TABLE AP_${storId}_APV_LN_E ( APV_NO BIGINT NOT NULL COMMENT '결재번호', APV_LN_HST_NO INT NOT NULL COMMENT (30) COMMENT '결재자직위코드', APVR_POSIT_NM VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '결재자직위명', APVR_TITLE_CD VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '결재자직책코드', APVR_TITLE_NM VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '결재자직책명', APV_DEPT_ID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT DT_DISP_VA VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '일시표시값', SIGN_IMG_PATH VARCHAR (240) COMMENT '서명이미지경로', VW_DT DATETIME COMMENT '조회일시', APV_DT DATETIME COMMENT '결재일시', PREV_APVR_APV_DT DATETIME COMMENT '이전결재자결재일시', APV_OPIN_CONT VARCHAR (2000) COMMENT '결재의견내용', APV_OPIN_DISP_YN CHAR (1) COMMENT '결재의견표시여부', PREV_BODY_HST_NO INT COMMENT '이전본문이력번호', HOLD_BODY_HST_NO INT COMMENT '보류본문이력번호', PREV_APV_LN_HST_NO INT COMMENT '이전결재라인이력번호', HOLD_APV_LN_HST_NO INT COMMENT '보류결재라인이력번호', PREV_ATT_HST_NO INT COMMENT '이전첨부이력번호', HOLD_ATT_HST_NO INT COMMENT '보류첨부이력번호', PREV_RECV_DEPT_HST_NO INT COMMENT '이전수신처이력번호', HOLD_RECV_DEPT_HST_NO INT COMMENT '보류수신처이력번호', PREV_REF_DOC_HST_NO INT COMMENT '이전참조문서이력번호', HOLD_REF_DOC_HST_NO INT COMMENT '보류참조문서이력번호', FIXD_APVR_YN CHAR (1) COMMENT '고정결재자여부', PRIMARY KEY (APV_NO, (30) COMMENT '결재자직위코드', APVR_POSIT_NM VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '결재자직위명', APVR_TITLE_CD VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '결재자직책코드', APVR_TITLE_NM VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '결재자직책명', APV_DEPT_ID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT DT_DISP_VA VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '일시표시값', SIGN_IMG_PATH VARCHAR (240) COMMENT '서명이미지경로', VW_DT DATETIME COMMENT '조회일시', APV_DT DATETIME COMMENT '결재일시', PREV_APVR_APV_DT DATETIME COMMENT '이전결재자결재일시', COMMENT '이전결재라인이력번호', HOLD_APV_LN_HST_NO INT COMMENT '보류결재라인이력번호', PREV_ATT_HST_NO INT COMMENT '이전첨부이력번호', HOLD_ATT_HST_NO INT COMMENT '보류첨부이력번호', PREV_RECV_DEPT_HST_NO INT COMMENT '이전수신처이력번호', /* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApxTableMYSQLDao.indexApOngdApvLnH : ${sqlSeq} */ CREATE INDEX IDX_AP_${storId}_APV_LN_H1 ON AP_${storId}_APV_LN_H (APV_NO, APV_LN_PNO, APV_LN_HST_NO)

/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApxTableMYSQLDao.createApOngdAttFileL : ${sqlSeq} */ CREATE TABLE AP_${storId}_ATT_FILE_L ( APV_NO BIGINT NOT NULL COMMENT '결재번호', ATT_HST_NO INT NOT NULL COMMENT '첨부이력번호', ATT_SEQ INT NOT NULL COMMENT '첨부일련번호', ATT_DISP_NM VARCHAR (240) NOT NULL COMMENT '첨부표시명', FILE_EXT VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '파일확장자', FILE_KB INT COMMENT '파일K바이트', FILE_PATH VARCHAR (240) COMMENT '파일경로', MODR_UID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '수정자UID', MOD_DT DATETIME COMMENT '수정일시', PRIMARY KEY (APV_NO, ATT_HST_NO, ATT_SEQ) ) COMMENT = '진행문서첨부파일내역'

/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApxTableMYSQLDao.createApOngdB : ${sqlSeq} */ CREATE TABLE AP_${storId}_B ( APV_NO BIGINT NOT NULL COMMENT '결재번호', DOC_NO VARCHAR (60) COMMENT '문서번호', COMP_ID VARCHAR (3) NOT NULL COMMENT '회사ID', DOC_SUBJ VARCHAR (400) COMMENT '문서제목', ATT_FILE_YN CHAR (1) NOT NULL COMMENT '첨부파일여부', FORM_ID VARCHAR (30) NOT NULL COMMENT '양식ID', FORM_SEQ INT NOT NULL COMMENT '양식일련번호', FORM_APV_LN_TYP_CD VARCHAR (30) NOT NULL COMMENT '양식결재라인구분코드', FORM_NM VARCHAR (240) COMMENT '양식명', BODY_HGHT_PX INT COMMENT '본문높이픽셀', FORM_WDTH_TYP_CD VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '양식넓이구분코드', DOC_LANG_TYP_CD VARCHAR (30) NOT NULL COMMENT '문서언어구분코드', DOC_STAT_CD VARCHAR (30) NOT NULL COMMENT '문서상태코드', DOC_PROS_STAT_CD VARCHAR (30) NOT NULL COMMENT '문서승인상태코드', DOC_KEEP_PRD_CD VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '문서보존기간코드', DOC_TYP_CD VARCHAR (30) NOT NULL COMMENT '문서구분코드', SECUL_CD VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '보안등급코드', UGNT_DOC_YN CHAR (1) COMMENT '긴급문서여부', ALL_READ_YN CHAR (1) COMMENT '전체열람여부', REG_REC_LST_REG_YN CHAR (1) COMMENT '등록대장등록여부', REG_REC_LST_REG_SKED_YMD DATETIME COMMENT '등록대장등록예정년월일', SECU_DOC_YN CHAR (1) COMMENT '보안문서여부', DOC_PW_ENC VARCHAR (240) COMMENT '문서비밀번호암호값', SENDR_NM_RESC_ID VARCHAR (50) COMMENT '발신명의리소스ID', SENDR_NM_RESC_NM VARCHAR (400) COMMENT '발신명의리소스명', OFSE_PATH VARCHAR (240) COMMENT '관인경로', OFSE_HGHT_PX INT COMMENT '관인높이픽셀', CLS_INFO_ID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '분류정보ID', PSN_CLS_INFO_ID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '개인분류정보ID', APV_LN_TYP_CD VARCHAR (30) NOT NULL COMMENT '결재라인구분코드', BODY_HST_NO INT NOT NULL COMMENT '본문이력번호', ATT_HST_NO INT NOT NULL COMMENT '첨부이력번호', RECV_DEPT_HST_NO INT NOT NULL COMMENT '수신처이력번호', REF_DOC_HST_NO INT NOT NULL COMMENT '참조문서이력번호', MAK_DT DATETIME COMMENT '기안일시', MAKR_UID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '기안자UID', MAKR_NM VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '기안자명', MAK_DEPT_ID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '기안부서ID', MAK_DEPT_NM VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '기안부서명', CUR_APVR_ID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '현재결재자ID', CUR_APVR_NM VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '현재결재자명', CUR_APVR_DEPT_YN CHAR (1) COMMENT '현재결재자부서여부', CMPL_DT DATETIME COMMENT '완결일시', CMPLR_UID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '완결자UID', CMPLR_NM VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '완결자명', ENFC_SCOP_CD VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '시행범위코드', ENFC_DT DATETIME COMMENT '시행일시', RECV_DOC_NO VARCHAR (60) COMMENT '접수문서번호', RECV_DT DATETIME COMMENT '접수일시', ENFC_DOC_KEEP_PRD_CD VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '시행문서보존기간코드', ENFC_STAT_CD VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '시행상태코드', SEND_INST_ID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '발송기관ID', SEND_INST_NM VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '발송기관명', REC_LST_TYP_CD VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '대장구분코드', REC_LST_DEPT_ID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '대장부서ID', ORGN_APV_NO BIGINT COMMENT '원본결재번호', TRX_APV_NO BIGINT COMMENT '변환결재번호', INTG_TYP_CD VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '연계구분코드', INTG_NO BIGINT COMMENT '연계번호', SENDR_NM_ORG_ID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '발신명의조직ID', SEND_WITH_REF_DOC_YN CHAR (1) COMMENT '참조문서포함발송여부', FOOTER_VA VARCHAR (400) COMMENT '바닥글값', XML_TYP_ID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT 'XML구분ID', PRIMARY KEY (APV_NO) ) COMMENT = '진행문서기본'

/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApxTableMYSQLDao.indexApOngdB : ${sqlSeq} */ CREATE INDEX IDX_AP_${storId}_B1 ON AP_${storId}_B (REC_LST_DEPT_ID, REC_LST_TYP_CD, ALL_READ_YN) CREATE INDEX IDX_AP_${storId}_B2 ON AP_${storId}_B (CLS_INFO_ID, REC_LST_TYP_CD, REC_LST_DEPT_ID) CREATE INDEX IDX_AP_${storId}_B3 ON AP_${storId}_B (DOC_PROS_STAT_CD, APV_NO) CREATE INDEX IDX_AP_${storId}_B4 ON AP_${storId}_B (ENFC_STAT_CD, APV_NO) CREATE INDEX IDX_AP_${storId}_B5 ON AP_${storId}_B (ORGN_APV_NO, APV_NO) CREATE INDEX IDX_AP_${storId}_B6 ON AP_${storId}_B (REG_REC_LST_REG_SKED_YMD, REG_REC_LST_REG_YN) CREATE INDEX IDX_AP_${storId}_B7 ON AP_${storId}_B (PSN_CLS_INFO_ID)

/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApxTableMYSQLDao.createApOngdBodyL : ${sqlSeq} */ CREATE TABLE AP_${storId}_BODY_L ( APV_NO BIGINT NOT NULL COMMENT '결재번호', BODY_HST_NO INT NOT NULL COMMENT '본문이력번호', BODY_HTML LONGTEXT NOT NULL COMMENT '본문HTML', MODR_UID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '수정자UID', MOD_DT DATETIME COMMENT '수정일시', PRIMARY KEY (APV_NO, BODY_HST_NO) ) COMMENT = '진행문서본문내역'

/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApxTableMYSQLDao.createApOngdErpFormD : ${sqlSeq} */ CREATE TABLE AP_${storId}_ERP_FORM_D ( APV_NO BIGINT NOT NULL COMMENT '결재번호', ERP_VA_TYP_CD VARCHAR (30) NOT NULL COMMENT 'ERP값구분코드', ERP_VA LONGTEXT COMMENT 'ERP값', PRIMARY KEY (APV_NO, ERP_VA_TYP_CD) ) COMMENT = '진행문서ERP양식상세'

/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApxTableMYSQLDao.createApOngdExD : ${sqlSeq} */ CREATE TABLE AP_${storId}_EX_D ( APV_NO BIGINT NOT NULL COMMENT '결재번호', EX_ID VARCHAR (30) NOT NULL COMMENT '확장ID', EX_VA VARCHAR (2000) COMMENT '확장값', PRIMARY KEY (APV_NO, EX_ID) ) COMMENT = '진행문서확장상세'

/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApxTableMYSQLDao.createApOngdExtnDocD : ${sqlSeq} */ CREATE TABLE AP_${storId}_EXTN_DOC_D ( APV_NO BIGINT NOT NULL COMMENT '결재번호', EXTN_DOC_TYP_CD VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '외부문서구분코드', EXTN_DOC_CONT_TYP_CD VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '외부문서컨텐츠구분코드', PICH_UID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '담당자UID', PICH_NM VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '담당자명', MAK_YY INT COMMENT '생산년도', SENDR_NM VARCHAR (240) COMMENT '발신자명', PAGE_CNT INT COMMENT '페이지수', MAK_ZONE_NM VARCHAR (240) COMMENT '생산지역명', ORGN_APV_NO BIGINT COMMENT '원본결재번호', REG_SEQ INT COMMENT '등록일련번호', PRIMARY KEY (APV_NO) ) COMMENT = '진행문서외부문서상세'
/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApxTableMYSQLDao.indexApOngdExtnDocD : ${sqlSeq} */ CREATE INDEX IDX_AP_${storId}_EXTN_DOC_D1 ON AP_${storId}_EXTN_DOC_D (ORGN_APV_NO)

/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApxTableMYSQLDao.createApOngdHoldOpinD : ${sqlSeq} */ CREATE TABLE AP_${storId}_HOLD_OPIN_D ( APV_NO BIGINT NOT NULL COMMENT '결재번호', APVR_UID VARCHAR (30) NOT NULL COMMENT '결재자UID', APV_OPIN_CONT VARCHAR (2000) COMMENT '결재의견내용', APV_OPIN_DISP_YN CHAR (1) COMMENT '결재의견표시여부', PRIMARY KEY (APV_NO, APVR_UID) ) COMMENT = '진행문서보류의견상세'

/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApxTableMYSQLDao.createApOngdPichD : ${sqlSeq} */ CREATE TABLE AP_${storId}_PICH_D ( APV_NO BIGINT NOT NULL COMMENT '결재번호', PICH_TYP_CD VARCHAR (30) NOT NULL COMMENT '담당자구분코드', PICH_UID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '담당자UID', PICH_DEPT_ID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '담당자부서ID', PICH_NM VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '담당자명', PICH_DEPT_NM VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '담당자부서명', PICH_OPIN_CONT VARCHAR (800) COMMENT '담당자의견내용', HDL_STAT_CD VARCHAR (30) NOT NULL COMMENT '처리상태코드', HDL_DT DATETIME COMMENT '처리일시', VW_DT DATETIME COMMENT '조회일시', PREV_APVR_APV_DT DATETIME COMMENT '이전결재자결재일시', PRIMARY KEY (APV_NO, PICH_TYP_CD) ) COMMENT = '진행문서담당자상세'

/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApxTableMYSQLDao.createApOngdPubBxCnfmL : ${sqlSeq} */ CREATE TABLE AP_${storId}_PUB_BX_CNFM_L ( PUB_BX_DEPT_ID VARCHAR (30) NOT NULL COMMENT '공람게시부서ID', APV_NO BIGINT NOT NULL COMMENT '결재번호', USER_UID VARCHAR (30) NOT NULL COMMENT '사용자UID', USER_NM VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '사용자명', DEPT_ID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '부서ID', DEPT_NM VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '부서명', POSIT_CD VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '직위코드', POSIT_NM VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '직위명', VW_DT DATETIME COMMENT '조회일시', PRIMARY KEY (PUB_BX_DEPT_ID, APV_NO, USER_UID) ) COMMENT = '진행문서공람게시확인내역'

/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApxTableMYSQLDao.createApOngdPubBxD : ${sqlSeq} */ CREATE TABLE AP_${storId}_PUB_BX_D ( PUB_BX_DEPT_ID VARCHAR (30) NOT NULL COMMENT '공람게시부서ID', APV_NO BIGINT NOT NULL COMMENT '결재번호', PUB_BX_DT DATETIME NOT NULL COMMENT '공람게시일시', PUB_BX_END_YMD DATETIME COMMENT '공람게시종료년월일', REGR_UID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '등록자UID', REGR_NM VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '등록자명', REG_DEPT_ID VARCHAR (30) NOT NULL COMMENT '등록부서ID', REG_DEPT_NM VARCHAR (120) COMMENT '등록부서명', PRIMARY KEY (PUB_BX_DEPT_ID, APV_NO) ) COMMENT = '진행문서공람게시상세'

/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApxTableMYSQLDao.createApOngdRecvDeptL : ${sqlSeq} */ CREATE TABLE AP_${storId}_RECV_DEPT_L ( APV_NO BIGINT NOT NULL COMMENT '결재번호', RECV_DEPT_HST_NO INT NOT NULL COMMENT '수신처이력번호', RECV_DEPT_SEQ INT NOT NULL COMMENT '수신처일련번호', RECV_DEPT_TYP_CD VARCHAR (30) NOT NULL COMMENT '수신처구분코드', RECV_DEPT_ID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '수신처ID', RECV_DEPT_NM VARCHAR (400) COMMENT '수신처명', REF_DEPT_ID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '참조처ID', REF_DEPT_NM VARCHAR (400) COMMENT '참조처명', MODR_UID VARCHAR (30) COMMENT '수정자UID', MOD_DT DATETIME COMMENT '수정일시', SEND_YN CHAR (1) COMMENT '발송여부', ADD_SEND_YN CHAR (1) NOT NULL COMMENT '추가발송여부', PRIMARY KEY (APV_NO, RECV_DEPT_HST_NO, RECV_DEPT_SEQ) ) COMMENT = '진행문서수신처내역'
